entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Annapolis Royal
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:18 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
